## TsConfigJson.CompilerOptions.useUnknownInCatchVariables property

Default catch clause variables as `unknown` instead of `any`<!-- -->.

Requires TypeScript version 4.4 or later.

 false

**Signature:**

```typescript
useUnknownInCatchVariables?: boolean;
```
